summary.p: Returns the statistical standard deviation of the specified expression in a group. NULL values are ignored.

param.name: value
param.p: An expression to determine the statistical standard deviation for.

returns.p: The statistical standard deviation of all evaluated values of expression in a group. NULL values are ignored.

remarks.p:
The STDEV aggregate function is limited to the following data types:
byte
sbyte
short
ushort
int
uint
long
ulong
decimal
float
double
